OSX
======================================

Changing file
--------------------------------------
  event on file.txt: change null

Creating file
--------------------------------------
  event on dir1: rename null

Deleting file
--------------------------------------
  event on dir1: rename null
  event on file.txt: rename null

Renaming file
--------------------------------------
  event on file.txt: rename null
  event on dir1: rename null

Moving file
--------------------------------------
  event on file.txt: rename null
  event on dir2: rename null
  event on dir1: rename null

Creating dir
--------------------------------------
  event on dir1: rename null

Renaming dir
--------------------------------------
  event on dir1: rename null
  event on root: rename null

Moving dir
--------------------------------------
  event on dir1: rename null
  event on dir2: rename null
  event on root: rename null

Deleting dir
--------------------------------------
  event on root: rename null
--------------------------------------
